EventsDetail.Title: Blood Drive
EventsDetail.Abstract: Help save a life by donating blood
EventsDetail.BodyCopy:
Come donate blood! Your donation could save up to three lives. We are also always looking for volunteers to help us run the drive.
The next blood drive is right around the corner:
February 27-28, March 1, 6, 8 Located in the Taylor chapel overflow
March 7 Located in the Special Events room (MC 387)

Sign up online to give blood online at www.redcrossblood.org.

Creating a User Profile (first time users only) and Making Your First Appointment

  1. Go to www.redcrossblood.org
  2. Click the "Account Login" (blue box in upper-right corner).
  3. Click the "Donor Login" and enter your ZIP code (can be home or work).
  4. Click the "First-time users create a profile" link.
  5. Complete the form and click the "Submit" button.
  6. You will be redirected to the "Find a Blood Drive" page.
  7. Enter your sponsor code (BYUID) or enter your zip code to find all donation opportunities in your area. A list of bloood drives will display.
  8. Click on the blood drive date/name for which you would like to make an appointment. A list of available appointment times will display.
  9. Click the "Schedule" link for the time you would like to donate.
  10. A confirmation of the appointment will now display. you will see that you have the option to print the confirmation page or download it to your Outlook calendar
  11. You will also be sent an e-mail confirmation within the next few minutes.
  12. You will be sent a reminder e-mail approximately one (1) day prior to your appointment.

Making a Blood Donation Appointment (already have a profile)

  1. Go to www.redcrossblood.org
  2. Click the "Enter a Sponsor Code" link (blue box).
  3. Enter the sponsor code provided by your blood drive chairperson and click "Go"
  4. Upcoming blood drive(s) will display - click the "Click here to schedule..." link.
  5. You will be redirected to the Login page - enter your Red Cross credentials (email address and password). The sponsor code you entered earlier should also display.
  6. Enter Zip code to search for open to public drives or enter sponsor code.
  7. All future blood drives that are accepting appointments will display. Click on the drive date/name for which you would like to make an appointment.
  8. A list of available appointment times will display.
  9. Click on the "Schedule" link for the time you would like to donate.
  10. A confirmation of the appointment will now display. you will see that you have the option to print the confirmation page or download it to your Outlook calendar.
  11. You will also be sent an e-mail confirmation within the next few minutes.
  12. You will be sent a reminder e-mail approximately one (1) day prior to your appointment.

Our Sponsor Code: BYUID


Changing or Canceling an Appointment

  1. Go to www.redcrossblood.org
  2. Click the "Account Login" (blue box in upper-right corner)
  3. Click "Donor Login" and enter your ZIP code (can be home or work)
  4. You will be redirected to the Login Page - enter your Red Cross credentials (email address and password). Click "Login"
  5. Click on "My Appointment History" (left side of screen). All future and past appointments will display.
  6. You will have the option to Edit or Cancel a future appointment
    1. Click on "Cancel" to cancel the appointment.
    2. If you would like to reschedule, click on "Edit" and select a new appointment time. To select a different blood drive date, scroll to the bottom of the appointment time list and click on the "Find Another Drive" link.
